pullrequest.title: Fix InertiaVisual for non-diagonal inertia matrices

content.raw:
An `InertiaVisual` test option:

1. Modify your example world to be all white.
1. Render the scene with inertia visuals and capture the image from the user camera.
1. Check columns of pixels that should be white, but would be purple without your change.
content.html:
An InertiaVisual test option:

  1. Modify your example world to be all white.
  2. Render the scene with inertia visuals and capture the image from the user camera.
  3. Check columns of pixels that should be white, but would be purple without your change.
